question: How many Rijksmonumenten (national heritage sites) are there in Leeuwarden, Netherlands?
asked_question_translated: Quantos Rijksmonumenten (locais de património nacional) existem em Leeuwarden, Países Baixos?
answer: Leeuwarden, na Holanda, possui aproximadamente 621 Rijksmonumenten.
answer_translated_eng: Leeuwarden, in the Netherlands, has approximately 621 Rijksmonumenten.
